item.title: A Father Speaks
item.description:
A Father Speaks by Elder George I. Cannon, Of the First Quorum of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 156th Semiannual General Conference on Tue Sep 30 1986
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder George I. Cannon, Of the First Quorum of the Seventy

item.title: Today—A Day of Eternity
item.description:
Today—A Day of Eternity by Elder George I. Cannon, Released Member of the Seventy given in Saturday Morning of 161st Semiannual General Conference on Mon Sep 30 1991
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
